verses.verse: Be you followers <S%G3402><s%> of me, even <S%G2531><s%> as I also <S%G2504><s%> am of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> I praise <S%G1867><s%> you, brothers, <S%G80><s%> that you remember <S%G3415><s%> me in all <S%G3956><s%> things, and keep <S%G2722><s%> the ordinances, <S%G3862><s%> as I delivered <S%G3860><s%> them to you.

But I would <S%G2309><s%> have you know, <S%G1492><s%> that the head <S%G2776><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G435><s%> is Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and the head <S%G2776><s%> of the woman <S%G1135><s%> is the man; <S%G435><s%> and the head <S%G2776><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> is God. <S%G2316><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G435><s%> praying <S%G4336><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> prophesying, <S%G4395><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> his head <S%G2776><s%> covered, <S%G2596><s%> dishonors <S%G2617><s%> his head. <S%G2776><s%>

But every <S%G3956><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> that prays <S%G4336><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> prophesies <S%G4395><s%> with her head <S%G2776><s%> uncovered <S%G177><s%> dishonors <S%G2617><s%> her head: <S%G2776><s%> for that is even <S%G2532><s%> all one <S%G1520><s%> as if she were shaven. <S%G3587><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> be not covered, <S%G2619><s%> let her also <S%G2532><s%> be shorn: <S%G2751><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> it be a shame <S%G149><s%> for a woman <S%G1135><s%> to be shorn <S%G2751><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> shaven, <S%G3587><s%> let her be covered. <S%G2619><s%>

For a man <S%G435><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> not to cover <S%G2619><s%> his head, <S%G2776><s%> for as much as he is the image <S%G1504><s%> and glory <S%G1391><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> but the woman <S%G1135><s%> is the glory <S%G1391><s%> of the man. <S%G435><s%>
For the man <S%G435><s%> is not of the woman: <S%G1135><s%> but the woman <S%G1135><s%> of the man. <S%G435><s%>
Neither <S%G2542><s%> <S%G3756><s%> was the man <S%G435><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> for the woman; <S%G1135><s%> but the woman <S%G1135><s%> for the man. <S%G435><s%>

For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> her head <S%G2776><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the angels. <S%G32><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> is the man <S%G435><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the woman, <S%G1135><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the man, <S%G435><s%> in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

For as the woman <S%G1135><s%> is of the man, <S%G435><s%> even so <S%G3779><s%> is the man <S%G435><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> by the woman; <S%G1135><s%> but all <S%G3956><s%> things of God. <S%G2316><s%>
Judge <S%G2919><s%> in yourselves: <S%G5213><s%> <S%G846><s%> is it comely <S%G4241><s%> that a woman <S%G1135><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> uncovered? <S%G177><s%>

Does not even <S%G3761><s%> nature <S%G5449><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> teach <S%G1321><s%> you, that, if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G435><s%> have long <S%G2863><s%> hair, <S%G2863><s%> it is a shame <S%G819><s%> to him?

But if <S%G1437><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> have long <S%G2863><s%> hair, <S%G2863><s%> it is a glory <S%G1391><s%> to her: for her hair <S%G2864><s%> is given <S%G1325><s%> her for a covering. <S%G4018><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man seem <S%G1380><s%> to be contentious, <S%G5380><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> custom, <S%G4914><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> in this <S%G5124><s%> that I declare <S%G3853><s%> to you I praise <S%G1867><s%> you not, that you come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> not for the better, <S%G2909><s%> but for the worse. <S%G2276><s%>

For first <S%G4412><s%> of all, when you come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> in the church, <S%G1577><s%> I hear <S%G191><s%> that there be divisions <S%G4978><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you; and I partly <S%G3313><s%> <S%G5100><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> it.

For there must <S%G1163><s%> be also <S%G2532><s%> heresies <S%G139><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, that they which are approved <S%G1384><s%> may be made <S%G1096><s%> manifest <S%G5318><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you.

When you come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G846><s%> place, this is not to eat <S%G5315><s%> the Lord's <S%G2960><s%> supper. <S%G1173><s%>

For in eating <S%G5315><s%> every <S%G1538><s%> one takes <S%G4301><s%> before <S%G4301><s%> other his own <S%G2398><s%> supper: <S%G1173><s%> and one <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> is hungry, <S%G3983><s%> and another <S%G3739><s%> is drunken. <S%G3184><s%>

What? <S%G1063><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you not houses <S%G3614><s%> to eat <S%G2068><s%> and to drink <S%G4095><s%> in? or <S%G2228><s%> despise <S%G2706><s%> you the church <S%G1577><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and shame <S%G2617><s%> them that have <S%G2192><s%> not? What <S%G5101><s%> shall I say <S%G2036><s%> to you? shall I praise <S%G1867><s%> you in this? <S%G5129><s%> I praise <S%G1867><s%> you not.

For I have <S%G2192><s%> received <S%G3880><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I delivered <S%G3860><s%> to you, That the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> night <S%G3571><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> he was betrayed <S%G3860><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> bread: <S%G740><s%>

And when he had given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he broke <S%G2806><s%> it, and said, <S%G2036><s%> Take, <S%G2983><s%> eat: <S%G5315><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is my body, <S%G4983><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is broken <S%G2806><s%> for you: this <S%G5124><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> in remembrance <S%G364><s%> of me.

After <S%G5615><s%> the same <S%G5615><s%> manner <S%G5615><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> he took the cup, <S%G4221><s%> when <S%G3326><s%> he had supped, <S%G1172><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> is the new <S%G2537><s%> testament <S%G1242><s%> in my blood: <S%G129><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> you, as oft <S%G3740><s%> as you drink <S%G4095><s%> it, in remembrance <S%G364><s%> of me.

For as often <S%G3740><s%> as you eat <S%G2068><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cup, <S%G4221><s%> you do show <S%G2605><s%> the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> till <S%G891><s%> <S%G3757><s%> he come. <S%G2064><s%>

Why <S%G5620><s%> whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall eat <S%G2068><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> unworthily, <S%G371><s%> shall be guilty <S%G1777><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> and blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
But let a man <S%G444><s%> examine <S%G1381><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> and so <S%G3779><s%> let him eat <S%G2068><s%> of that bread, <S%G740><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> of that cup. <S%G4221><s%>

For he that eats <S%G2068><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> unworthily, <S%G371><s%> eats <S%G2068><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> damnation <S%G2917><s%> to himself, <S%G1438><s%> not discerning <S%G1252><s%> the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> body. <S%G4983><s%>
For this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> are weak <S%G770><s%> and sickly <S%G732><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, and many <S%G2425><s%> sleep. <S%G2837><s%>
For if <S%G1487><s%> we would judge <S%G1252><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> we should not be judged. <S%G2919><s%>
But when we are judged, <S%G2919><s%> we are chastened <S%G3811><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that we should not be condemned <S%G2632><s%> with the world. <S%G2889><s%>
Why, <S%G5620><s%> my brothers, <S%G80><s%> when you come <S%G4905><s%> together <S%G4905><s%> to eat, <S%G5315><s%> tarry <S%G1551><s%> one <S%G240><s%> for another. <S%G240><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> hunger, <S%G3983><s%> let him eat <S%G2068><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> home; <S%G3624><s%> that you come <S%G4905><s%> not together <S%G4905><s%> to condemnation. <S%G2917><s%> And the rest <S%G3062><s%> will I set <S%G1299><s%> in order <S%G1299><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> I come. <S%G2064><s%>
